name: Words in Words 2 Quiz | Words in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Question: Consumed around a period in time (hint - 6 letters, ventilate).
Answer: Aerate - the letters ATE (consumed) around the letters ERA (period in time).
Sounds easy enough, now it's your turn ...
